title: New free champion rotation: Blitzcrank, Corki, Karthus and more!

replies.body: Get ready for all those thresh and blitz missed pulls in normal this week.
Or you play blind, end up with blitz against blitz bot lane, and watch the blitz trade places when they hook each other at the same time!
What if Blitz and Thresh hook the same person? do they tear a hole in the universe or just tear him in half?
